subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Juan José Haedo took advantage of a chaotic finish to win Stage 16 of the Vuelta a España, and Juanjo Cobo increased his overall lead going into the race’s final week.
snippet: Juan José Haedo took advantage of a chaotic finish to win Stage 16 of the Vuelta a España, and Juanjo Cobo increased his overall lead going into the race’s final week.
